core.comp3111

Class ImportExportCSV

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.comp3111.ImportExportCSV

  • public class ImportExportCSV
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for handling the import and export of csv files. Only CSV files that follow the excel comma delimited format will be accepted.
    Author:
    kwaleung

      • importCSV

        public DataTable importCSV(java.io.File selectedFile)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This functions reads a CSV file of the user's choice and creates a DataTable according to the content provided by the CSV
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - -selected file object to be imported from
        Returns:
        -true if CSV imported -false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - -throws exception when there is error while importing CSV

      • exportCSV

        public void exportCSV(java.io.File selectedFile,
                      java.lang.String selectedDataSetName,
                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,DataTable> datasets)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        This functions writes a data table chosen by the user to a CSV format file.
        Parameters:
        selectedFile - -the selected file object for exporting to
        selectedDataSetName - -Name of data table to be exported
        datasets - -current collection of data tables
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - -throws exception when there is error while exporting CSV
